SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Patient Health Questionnaire-2 - Over the past 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems? Feeling down, depressed or hopeless.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PHQ-2 - Feeling Down, Depressed or Hopeless

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Patient Health Questionnaire-2 - Over the past 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems? Little interest or pleasure in doing things.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: PHQ-2 - Little Interest or Pleasure in Doing Things
